de.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties

Class RescaledUIProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties.UIProperty
      • de.embl.rieslab.emu.ui.uiproperties.RescaledUIProperty

  • public class RescaledUIProperty
extends UIProperty
    A RescaledUIProperty is only compatible with IntegerMMProperty and FloatMMProperty. Once the scaling factors have been set, any value set using setPropertyValue(String) will be scaled to slope*value+offset. Inversely, any update from the MMProperty will be scaled to (value-offset)/slope.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

      • isCompatibleMMProperty

        Description copied from class: UIProperty
        Checks if the MMProperty is compatible with the UIProperty.
        Overrides:
        isCompatibleMMProperty in class UIProperty
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if it is, false otherwise.

      • setScalingFactors

        public boolean setScalingFactors(double slope,
                                 double offset)
        Sets the scaling factors applied to scale the values submitted to the UIProperty to the limits of the MMProperty. If the slope or the offset are not finite, the values will be refused. The slope cannot be zero.
        Parameters:
        slope - Slope
        offset - Offset
        Returns:
        True if the slope and offset were set, false otherwise.
